text: The 2005 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season was the 15th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The 2005 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was hosted by Bradley and won by Creighton. == Teams == == MVC Tournament == == See also == * Missouri Valley Conference * Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer tournament * 2005 NCAA Division I men's soccer season * 2005 in American soccer == References == Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:2005 NCAA Division I men's soccer season
title: 2005 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season
